title: How to Land an Internship or Job, Interview Tips for Students & More: The Intern Queen
itunes:title: How to Land an Internship or Job, Interview Tips for Students & More: The Intern Queen
description:
Today we are joined with special guest Lauren Berger, better known as the Intern Queen!  We ask Lauren all of your career/internship questions and get some advice ourselves!  Be sure to check out Lauren on her socials (@internqueen) and check out https://www.internqueen.com/ for more!

Go to https://www.shoedazzle.com/galsonthego to step up your look today for as low as $10!

You can check out our channels on YouTube:
Brooke Miccio
Danielle Carolan

Follow @galsonthegopodcast on Instagram!

For business inquires, email brookeanddaniellepodcast@gmail.com

Everything Gals on the Go: https://linktr.ee/galsonthegopodcast
